lead: Build your theory on the board before submitting. Each thread should support a fact: who, where, when, how, and why.
points: Click map pins to read a location; click the same pin again to drop that Location on the board.
Use the timeline slider to reveal events progressively; drag timeline events onto the board.
Open 'Suspects' to read detailed alibis and motives; drag suspect chips to the board from the library.
Shift-click any two cards on the board to draw a thread between them.
Save your board anytime; you can clear and rebuild without losing the story.
Submit your solution from the panel on the right. Feedback never reveals the answer.
